title: CHIC Punta Cana by Royalton Luxury Resorts Leads the Way in Green Sustainable Business Practices With the Installation of Onelink Global ECA and Green Chemical Program
text:
SOURCE: CHIC Punta Cana July 21, 2015 14:35 ET CHIC Punta Cana by Royalton Luxury Resorts Leads the Way in Green Sustainable Business Practices With the Installation of Onelink Global ECA and Green Chemical Program 
TORONTO, ON --(Marketwired - July 21, 2015) - CHIC Punta Cana by Royalton Luxury Resorts has just completed the installation of a new Electro-Chemical-Activation (ECA) Technology and complete Green Chemical program for Housekeeping and Kitchens. The first of its kind ever to be put into operation in the Dominican Republic, the new One Link Global eco-friendly cleaning and sanitizing system will aid waste reduction, help simplify processes and contribute to reducing the hotel's entire carbon footprint. Easier to maintain and service, the new management system is also expected to improve employees' overall working conditions. 
The upgraded cleaning and sanitizing program is just one of the steps the hotel chain has made with regards to improving sustainability throughout all operations. Earlier this year, two of its other properties Royalton Punta Cana , Dominican Republic and Royalton White Sands , Jamaica were highly commended by Green Globe , the only international organization rating hotels based on their long-term commitment to incorporating sustainable practices into their day-to-day operations. 
General Manager for CHIC Punta Cana , Mauricio Zarate, commented, "We are proud to be able to have made this significant investment towards improving our eco-footprint so soon since opening last Christmas and to be leading the way across the island with this new technology. As well as streamlining our operations, the new ECA and Green Chemical program is a significant step towards achieving our overall green sustainability target, including Green Globe accreditation in the medium term. Tourism is an extremely important industry to the Dominican Republic and it is important that resorts such as ours do all they can to ensure the environment is impacted as little as possible by their activities." 
Gennaro Cirone, President of One Link Global (OLG) added, "This represents a new milestone for OLG and full commitment from the Blue Diamond Resort Group to practice and implement Green Sustainable business practices on their properties. This is the first ever combined ECA and Green Chemical Program in the Dominican Republic. It is truly an innovative Sustainable Program . The system will yield cost savings, simplified processes, waste reduction, simplify training & service, improve employee working conditions, reduce carbon footprints and provide another Green Program into the CHIC Hotel." 
For more information on CHIC Punta Cana visit www.chicpuntacana.com . 
About Royalton Luxury Resorts 
Epitomizing sophisticated indulgence, Royalton Luxury Resorts offer All-In Luxury™ vacations in some of the world's most popular tropical destinations, including Jamaica, the Dominican Republic, Mexico and Cuba. Boasting an array of world-class all inclusive features including the premium, handcrafted DreamBed™, unlimited reservation-free luxury dining, 'round the clock concierge, 'All-In Connectivity' with complimentary WiFi, in room long distance calling, a Sports Event Guarantee, and more. Many resorts cater equally to families and couples alike, with industry-leading supervised kids and teen activities offered at no additional charge together with family-friendly accommodation and dining options. Couples and newlyweds could opt for an adults only property or choose a Hideaway at Royalton resort that offers guests a boutique 'hotel within a hotel' experience within a larger resort. Also offered by Royalton Luxury Resorts, CHIC Punta Cana invites guests to sample a unique Miami's South Beach meets Las Vegas ambience in a Caribbean setting, on one of the Dominican Republic's finest stretches of beachfront. Confirmed leaders in luxury resort experiences, the brand has won numerous accolades.
